CheaterPlayerStrategy - Class in org.concordia.macs.Strategy
The CheaterPlayerStrategy class defines a strategy where the issueOrder() method conquers all immediate neighboring enemy countries, and then doubles the number of armies on its countries that have enemy neighbors.

This constructor refers to the cheater player strategy.
